website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful and unbreakable: the best available if you want coffee mugs that will stand the test of time for both style and function.
pros: Impressive features: double-walled stainless steel, eco-friendly materials, shatterproof craftsmanship, attractive brushed finish
cons: Not for use in the microwave

customer_reviews.title: Handle easily broke!!! Not woth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for about a month and barely used it, but the handle already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cups.  Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cups. Only 4 stars after using and testing. Poured a cup of coffee the other day fresh out of the pot into both this cup and a ceramic cup. Immediately the ceramic cup lowered the temp of the coffee by about 15 degrees compared to this cup. However I don't think it kept the coffee hotter any longer than the ceramic cup. Will experiment some more. Overall though, don't think they will break like all my ceramic cups have when dropped, plus they look fantastic and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: This was a very disappointing purchase. I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing purchase. I was looking for a mug that would keep my coffee hot. In the "features and details" this product specifically states that it "keeps your drink hot or cold for longer". After using this it did not keep my drink hot any longer than a ceramic mug. Once I looked back at the "details' it stated it keeps drink hotter "a few minutes longer". I wish this statement was in the snapshot view under "features and details" or removed completely as not a feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Borders

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Me & the Environment!
customer_reviews.text: I love these double walled coffee mugs for many reasons: 1. They are double walled, so keep hot beverages hot longer. 2. They are stainless steel (SS), so naturally better for my health vs the plastic or styrofoam I was using while camping. In addition SS does not retain odors nor stain. 3. No BPA. That alone makes them worth the purchase price for me! 3. They are better for the earth, ridding it of unnecessary waste. Because they are SS, they clean up easily & are reused. 4. They look clean & are sturdy & sharp looking! The problems a few people had are likely unique & not the norm. I'm guessing the co. has good customer support.
customer_reviews.author: jb, NP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep your coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed first of all with the colors I ordered purple and orange I was sent black and white. I thought this cup would keep my coffee hot a bit longer than my regular cup. I was wrong the only difference was that I couldn't feel the heat when holding the cup at least with my regular cup I could warm it up in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs! Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: My only wish is that these mugs were bigger! Not only are the mugs exactly what they advertise, but the company is very responsive and works hard for its customers. The mugs are lightweight but feel well made. There are no seams except where the handles are welded. I've run them through the dishwasher without an issue. They keep my coffee warm for longer than ceramic or glass.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative for travel. Add silicone lids to complete the effect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. We have double-walled Borosilicate glasses for home, but they are too fragile to travel with. These stainless steel ones are the perfect alternative. They don't insulate quite as well as the glass ones, but they are better than plain ceramic mugs. We take these along with some Charles Viancin silicone drink lids (e.g.  whenever we travel. Works great for keeping coffee at a good temperature so you can enjoy it longer without rushing to finish the cup. Would recommend and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Barclay

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are super classy looking and mindfully made
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are super classy looking and mindfully made. They look great in our Airstream, too. The double wall mugs keep coffee nice and hot and are sturdy enough for camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: N. C

customer_reviews.title: Double Wall Keeps Hot Drinks Cool
customer_reviews.text: I like the double wall design. You can cradle the mug in your hand and the heat does not transfer so that it is too hot to hold as it might with just the steel enamel camping mug designs. They seem sturdy, though we have just started using them, I believe they will hold up well. Color names on the mugs is kinda funny but useful. Perhaps images would be good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for camping. Bought to use at home. Nice quality and heavy. Love that each mug has a different name etched in side to distinguish one mug from another.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: They worked well if preheated first
customer_reviews.text: We are spoiled heating our coffee and tea repeatedly in the microwave oven, so perhaps this is picky. Very well made stainless cups, but we had to preheat them first, and you can't put metal in a microwave. We had to preheat with hot water, & we don't have instant hot water, as we live in Maine with a hot water tank, and water lines that are not insulated properly and nearly impossible to get to. When preheated properly with very hot water, it really helped keep the drinks hot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: We use these mugs when we go to hotels. Instead of the paper cups they offer, we dispense coffee into these. The coffee definitely stays hotter longer - even without lids. We prefer drinking hot liquids from open top cups because lids frequently lead to burns. Frequently, the coffee doesn't dispense until you have the bottom of the cup quite a ways up... and then the hot coffee rushes out. These mugs appear well-constructed and are easy to clean. The outside of the mug remains cool while filled with piping hot liquid. And you can't beat the envious stares of the other hotel tenants at the continental breakfast (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: No Burned Lips.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cups. I purchased these exclusively for my camper. They do not transfer heat from hot beverages to the outer wall so you will not burn your lips off. They clean very easily and keep their polished shine. I will be purchasing a couple more since the people we went with burned their lips on their cheap single wall plastic cups.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got a set of these for my sons to use. Of course one kid wants exactly what the other has so a pair was just what the doctor ordered. They clean well, are comfortable to hold, and appear to be of good quality. We're hoping for many years of wonderful usage. Also the seller was wonderful to deal with and quickly answered any questions we had.
customer_reviews.author: taco tuesdays

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot but mug is hot too
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother because she keeps heating up her same tea in the microwave. The cups are nice and keeps hot tea hotter for a long time compared to regular mug. She likes them however the mug on the outside stays very hot it's hard to hold or drink from until the mug has cooled down. About time the mug cools down the drink is also lukewarm.
customer_reviews.author: Vernita

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We discovered stainless steel cups at a coffee shop while vacationing in Alabama and loved them! Owner of coffee shop said he ordered them from Amazon so we ordered a set and They were at our doorstep when we returned home. They keep coffee warm, easy to hold on to. Love the orange/ purple designation....practical as well as whimsical. Great coffee mugs
customer_reviews.author: Cletti

customer_reviews.title: Double wall does not act as insulator.
customer_reviews.text: They're sturdy, but they don't slow the rate of cooling like the Bodum double-wall glass mugs do. These are more like camping equipment. Still, they're 'nice.' One is labeled "purple" and the other, "orange." Kinda like a his-hers, which is how my wife and I treat them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! They don’t get too hot on the outside, no metallic taste and look good! One of cups came in defective though and when I emailed the seller, they responded that they already shipped a replacement! What a great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Terletskiy

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are beautiful if your on the fence buy them you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: GTF

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot drinks warm
customer_reviews.text: I was initially surprised at the weight of the mug. It weighs much less than my ceramic mugs. That said, I do like the lighter weight. The handle is a nice size. I don't put them in the dishwasher as we have very hard water and I get water spots. So I hand wash them and dry immediately. (I did put them in the dishwasher and they handled it with no problem-I just don't like the water spots ) They do seem to keep the coffee warmer a little longer. I plan on ordering other "colors."
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly pleased with product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service with an amazon warehouse mislabeling issue, they responded immediately and made it right above and beyond. The mugs are delightful to hold and use, and perfect for our camping trip. The "colors" made everyone laugh and they fight over which one. (Sigh) Definitely recommend. They are on smaller side, so if you like a massive cup at once, go into it knowing that. We love them, and I plan on getting the rest of the "colors"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mug
customer_reviews.text: I could really have done without the “green/red” words on them. With that said, these are absolutely outstanding cups. Well insulated, durable and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: TOM

customer_reviews.title: Clever Colors.  New Favorite Coffee Cup.
customer_reviews.text: These are good size cups and coffee seems to taste more "crisp/fresh" by using these vs a regular coffee mug. Very important to follow the initial cleaning directions, it will remove any hint of metal aftertaste. Although these are dishwasher safe, I prefer to hand wash all of my stainless steel products for the spot free and shiny look.
customer_reviews.author: GS-Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Literal Color Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use these while camping, and recently we took them with us one a trip to see family on the other side of the country. They survived nicely in the suitcase despite how luggage seems to be handled on airlines. I just may get an other set to keep in the truck for regular travel.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coffee Hot a  Lot Longer
customer_reviews.text: We are using these for morning coffee and they DO keep it hot a lot longer than a regular cup. Very well made and come with instructions to get them properly ready for first use. A good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazilla

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: A little small for my coffee addiction, but perfect for those campsite mornings. Bought these specifically for camping and received exactly what I wanted. It's fun to ask someone for my "purple" mug.
customer_reviews.author: Lope

customer_reviews.title: These are very nicely made and of very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I searched a few hundred different mugs before deciding on purchasing these mugs and one factor in my decision making was the amount of positive reviews that these mugs received. These are very nicely made and of very good quality. Satisfied customer 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sheno

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Left it soak in a pot of water and Heinz vinegar over night, washed with sponge and detergent in the morning. I've been using it for all my drinks, water, milk, milk alternatives, hot drinks ,etc. No issues, easy to clean, simple to use. Doesn't become hot when I pour boiling water in to make tea.
customer_reviews.author: Some-guy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, good insulating properties
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, good insulating properties. Keeps my coffee hot a bit longer than my ceramic mug. It has nice balance and is comfortable to hold. I was hoping for a more Thermos-like effect but that was only wishful thinking. Still I like it. The engraved color names are a fun touch. Especially for a colorblind user like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, and the person who got them has continued to rave about them. She especially notes that they keep liquids both hot or cold. And they are great for camping, riding on the boat and clean up easily. The inside color is so attractive
customer_reviews.author: kenphy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant appearance and function.
customer_reviews.text: Handsome cups, which hold my coffee warm, even when off the warmer. The red and green labels are a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these mugs to keep my morning cup of joe warmer for a long period of time. This was accomplished and now my coffee stays at a reasonable temperature through breakfast. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: drab

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are fantastic. They kept my tea wicked hot
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are fantastic. They kept my tea wicked hot, while the outside stayed nice and cold. They're near industrable to boot. My only suggestion is to not leave beverages in there for an extended period of time (24hrs+) or else the insides will stain (but that's par for the course for must mugs).
customer_reviews.author: D.Chap

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cups!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cups! Really like it. I keep them on our boat. Got a lot of complements!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: love these cups and originally gave it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: love these cups and originally gave it 5 stars, but changing to 4. it looks like the handles are not properly sealed and one of the cups is no longer usable as it started leaking from the bottom handle connection! For information, I use these cups daily (M-F) for 1 cup of hot coffee in the am, then water throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: dominus suen

customer_reviews.title: Great cups for our trailer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mugs for my travel trailer. Lots of good things about them, they keep my coffee warmer longer, they are marked so we don't get our drinks mixed up, stand up to being tossed around in the trailer. My only negative is I wish the handles where bigger, a whimpy handle for a strong cup. But even if they didn't change the handle I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: NRL

customer_reviews.title: I love these mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs so much! I use them every day for my coffee. They are a great size - that extra ounce and a half makes it feel luxurious without being too much. The handle is very comfortable. The insulation keeps me from burning my hand on the side of the cup. Altogether a good product, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great look and love idea of different letter etched in side so you can tell your cup from someone else’s.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deformed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three sets of these, two boxes came fine but one of the boxes had a mug that was completely deformed.
customer_reviews.author: vian

customer_reviews.title: Great around the campfire
customer_reviews.text: These cups keep your coffee warmer longer than regular mugs around the campfire and are comfortable to hold. The only thing I would like is a bigger capacity one.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are exactly what I needed. My old camping mugs were so bad and too hot to handle. These double walled mugs are perfect for my coffee when I’m around my early morning campfire. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Double Wall Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mugs and plan on buying more next month. They keep my coffee hotter longer than a regular cup and even longer if you rinse the inside of the cup with hot water before using. If this company ever makes a bigger size mug I will definitely be buying it too.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got these mugs for my husband. He's trying to get away from plastic. These are perfect for his morning coffee.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee mug.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful on so many levels, I like the polished interiors. You just can't stick them in the microwave ( no big deal because they keep your coffee warmer longer ).
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Color words are great for kids to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Color words are great for kids to know who's who with out fighting "I want the blue". Durable so far kids use them every day all day.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Dream

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA of 18/8 steel inside and out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mugs because they aren't made in China (made in USA) and also because they are 18/8 stainless steel inside and out. In addition, they are light weight and very attractive. The engraved color names (not the color itself) on the mugs let you know which mug is yours, yet they match as a set. They are exactly what I wanted. I'd give them a 10 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: California Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best Mugs Ever, No Lie
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mugs for a camping trip we're going on. I have always liked stainless steel and had some with covers for traveling. But with the covers the coffee stayed way too hot. I am extremely happy with these mugs. The outside stays cool and the coffee stays hot. There are plenty of other stainless steel mugs out there, but these have colors names etched on them. It makes it so much easier to distinguish whose cup is whose. And the words are on both sides. Would definitely recommend these mugs 💖
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Boncorddo

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Aeropress
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair to use with my Aeropress at work. It fits well, and is steady when I press the coffee directly into the cup. The coffee stays warm for longer than a regular mug, but these really need to come with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Maven

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great camping mugs! Well made and comfy to hold- looking forward to using these for years to come. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: peaches87

customer_reviews.title: Different inscribed colors is a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with a percolator from Coletti. They are very good quality, comfortable handles to hold and keep the coffee hot for a long time. I especially like the different colors inscribed on them so you can tell who's is who's.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramie B.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylishly
customer_reviews.text: 1 Cup says Black and other one white riding it could be interpreted wrong as racial problem i wood advice to to make White Coffe and Black Coffe
customer_reviews.author: EDLIR S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a white elephant give exchange and they were a hit. I thought they were so near I went home and bought a couple for the wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is unconfortable
customer_reviews.text: Is uncofortable in the moment whe you have to grab it by the handle
customer_reviews.author: EL Yuni

customer_reviews.title: I love these mugs and they're exactly what I wanted as ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs and they're exactly what I wanted as a Christmas gift. I guess it's the design, but I'm a little bothered that the word red and green don't line up exactly, but the gift recipient is fine with it. I love the humor of the colors on stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Cair

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughter's boyfriend. They are both big coffee drinkers. They were a HIT!!! He loves that they are double walled stainless steel so that they keep your coffee hot without burning your fingers. Definitely a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C.

customer_reviews.title: I'll give them a three because they're nice cops they hold a regular size cup of coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll give them a three because they're nice cops they hold a regular size cup of coffee but they might keep your coffee hot for about 10 extra minutes
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Rebant

customer_reviews.title: Nice mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mugs for camping/back country hiking - they are great! I followed the directions and let sit overnight with vinegar and water before washing for the first time. They clean up easily even when camping. Nice design and pleased with how they are made. Although I bought for camping and hiking in mind, I wouldn't have a problem using these on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Two very well made Stainless Steel 13.5 oz coffee cups. Well worth the price. Ever buy something on a whim, and after using it a while wonder how you ever lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Bought 6
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are cute.They keep coffee warm until I finish .I use them in -doors.The y hang on hooks in my kitchen and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Randall W. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with those cups. We use them for camping, and they definitely keep coffee hot longer than plastic or even ceramic cups. They are lightweight, pretty to look at, easy to clean and do what they are supposed to. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, it just shows water spots and fingerprints easily - keeps my coffee nice and hot
customer_reviews.author: Carolin M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Cups are perfect for keeping coffee warm which is what we bought them for. Very satisfied, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: WINSTON donahue

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of these mugs. They arrived quickly and made perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alaskangal B

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Mugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy mugs, but not too heavy. The double-wall seems to keep drinks cool or hot for a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mug. Don’t know why the names of colors are etched on the side - they don’t actually show as colors with hot or cold liquids inside, it’s just etched. Weird. Otherwise excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina in CA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, look, and dishwasher safe which is big for me (hate doing dishes). Keeps it hotter than a regular cup but since it doesn't have a top, and it's not a yeti, it's not going to be hot for super long. Still, it's very nice looking and I'd give them as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: MazyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, well made, holds two cups. It keeps liquids hotter and for a longer time than any standard mug. A little pricey, but with proper care it should last a lifetime. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Antonio Arce Arenales

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot and cold longer than ceramic mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs, especially that they are literally colored, would like to have the option of other literal, marks and signs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for them cold days
customer_reviews.text: Very well insulated, keep my coffee warmer longer compared to my ceramic and clay coffee mugs. Light weight, easy to hold, and aesthetically pleasing. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Bo-jangles

customer_reviews.title: Camping
customer_reviews.text: Love these for camping. Heat up nicely and clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: These by far are my favorite product I’ve purchased in 2018! They are not only cute, but extremely durable. We are fulltime RVers and were searching for something to replace our flimsy plastic “camp” cups. These were just what we were looking for. We ordered 6 for our family of 4 and the number has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping coffee hot for a long period of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping coffee hot for a long period of time. I did have to wait a period of time for my coffee to cool down enough to sip comfortably. Nice looking mug and love the "no finger prints" surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dynva B. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping now it's my go to coffee mug
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This set was nice. Felt kind of on the cheap end
customer_reviews.text: This set was nice. Felt kind of on the cheap end.. especially the handles. They just felt like someone could have made them better. But if they would have kept my coffee hot longer I would have been thrilled. They didn't keep them any longer than my regular cup. I wanted them to work. Truely I did. They just didn't.
customer_reviews.author: rjh----8

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with them and I was surprised with how light ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with them and I was surprised with how light they are, as my previous double wall cups were ceramic with a silicon lid and grip. They were much heavier and didn't do well if they were dropped. I also like having a real handle.
customer_reviews.author: James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent mugs that keep your coffee hot; while it’s cool to the touch while you hold it!!
customer_reviews.text: You should provide them to be personalized; instead of just black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Bill DeMott

customer_reviews.title: otherwise i like it, light weight
customer_reviews.text: i gave this product 4 only because of it's price,otherwise i like it, light weight ,highly polished from inside,well done .
customer_reviews.author: konan

customer_reviews.title: Nice mugs
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I only wished the handle would be a little bit more ergonomic. If the shape of the handle were flat instead of the round shape I'd feel more comfortable. Otherwise, I like the mugs
customer_reviews.author: Max Klepp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BRAND
customer_reviews.text: We love all these products. Keep coming back for more. So we’ll made. Dishwasher safe. And I love the labels.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought these for camping. They are maybe a little bit expensive but they are very nicely made and keep us from burning our hands like we did with regular mugs full of boiling hot campfire coffee.
customer_reviews.author: John Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: Great cups, excellent design. At first my fiends thought they were funny, now they all fight over who get them. Guess I'll have to order more so I can use one again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use. High quality SS Mugs.
customer_reviews.text: They keep our Coffee hotter than ceramic mugs. Very light weight. We do pre-warm them with hot water. We find it helps keeping the coffee warm for linger.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be of good quality, but of smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: K. Eddington

customer_reviews.title: They are nicely made, well insulated and just plain cute
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these to use in our RV. They are nicely made, well insulated and just plain cute. My husband really fell in love with them, especially how they insulate your hot beverage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just love these cups they keep my beverages hot and ready for me while I get ready in the mornings or on a lazy evening! Great size easy to clean and take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can stop searching now ;)
customer_reviews.text: It’s all good...Make that great! Great packaging, great quality, great instructions on care/use, and sincerely great customer service. These are new mugs, but I’m a huge fan of the company and how they conduct business!
customer_reviews.author: NY shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool - love that they have no BPA or plastics!
customer_reviews.author: SFGQ

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so great, they look nice, work well and it's a classy little thing to have the printed words for the colors so you can tell them apart when using them! Will probably buy more!
customer_reviews.author: MimaB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mugs! I like that I can't break them....and i really like that there's no paint or plastic!
customer_reviews.author: ed378

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Marginally better at heat retention than ceramic without a lid to really trap the heat. Looks cool and will last a long time. Everyone that grabs one for coffee asks me about them because they like the look.
customer_reviews.author: David Flaningan

customer_reviews.title: Hot coffee here!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a mug that would keep his coffee piping hot, and he found it with this one. Just what he was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mugs......seem to enhance the taste of the coffee......would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups, I bought 3 sets, gifted one, took one to the office, and kept one at home. Very well made and pleasant to drink out of. People comment on them often at work and ask where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: espcoyote

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I love having hot coffee with my morning coffee and these lovely mugs keep my coffee far warmer than any coffee mug I have ever used, plus they are attractive and light weight. Really pleased
customer_reviews.author: Arvilla Sheron

customer_reviews.title: Love my new mugs
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. Back home where I come from we drink coffee/tea in a stainless steel mugs:) So I loved it. Also it keeps the beverage hot . If you follow the initial cleaning instructions then it gives a nice shine to the mugs. Outside doesn't become hot.
customer_reviews.author: Pratibha Manjunath

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: It's durable, light and it holds temperature well. The handle is easy to hold. The simple design is great too. The pre-use cleaning instructions from the maker of the mug are useful.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cups! I could finally get rid of all the not-very-hygienic plastic ones I'd been using for years... And they keep the temperature well.
customer_reviews.author: sim

customer_reviews.title: The accolades are are larger than the cups!
customer_reviews.text: Morning coffee, of course. Only regrets is that we didn’t order the larger size. However, we’re enjoying what we have, especially the very smooth cup lip.
customer_reviews.author: CdC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great but the handle is a little cramped when I hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: From Campsite to Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for camping, but I can't seem to part with them from my kitchen! I love the look, they're the perfect size, they keep hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold, and they have an ergo-friendly design for holding. The company itself? Ah-mazing!! Family-owned, green, and provides second-to-none customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kadee Smalley

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Coffee Mugs Camping - Double Wall BPA free 13.5oz Metal Coffee Mug - Tea Cup Wide Handle, Fits Popular Coffee Machines - Shatterproof Set of 2 Cups with Laser Words Black & White
product_meta.description:
Color:A BLACK-WHITE Premium Wider Handle SetStainless steel coffee mugs that are a joy to drink from with a beautiful mouth feel and a wide comfortable handle to hold.

Double walled mugs with air insulation. Unlike vacuum insulated cups, these cups are TRULY dishwasher safe for a lifetime of washes. They don't use any glue or chemical-infused valve so they're also better for you.

Be happy that your cups are practical and different - The laser etched 'colors' make it easy to tell which mug is yours when you refill thanks to the etched Literal Color words 'black' on one cup and 'white' on the other cup.

These metal mugs are 13.5 oz, unbreakable, insulated, dishwasher safe with eco-friendly gift packaging. The curved contoured handle is inspired by traditional coffee cups so it has a familiar feel in your hand with more finger room than round handle cups. With the strong laser welded handle and 18/8 stainless steel inside and out, this durable shatterproof mug is designed to last a lifetime.

The Statistics: 

13.5 oz Capacity (to the rim)
3.78” Tall
3.25” Outside Diameter

Better For Your Mugs are perfect for:

- Coffee, tea, beer, smoothies, milkshakes, iced tea, juice, spirits even ice cream or as a unique snack-server!
- Your home: ready when you are for your morning coffee or during the day when you can sit back and relax
- Gifting to friends and family: They will love this stylish and practical mug. Our clean, eco-friendly packaging also makes a great first impression.
- RVing, Camping, Hiking: Lightweight and unbreakable so you won’t have to replace any more broken ceramic mugs.
- At work: Your mug will stand out from the others and is easy to wash.
- Boating & Sailing: This will be the new star(board) attraction on deck!
feature_bullets: STAINLESS STEEL COFFEE MUGS THAT ARE DURABLE ENOUGH TO TAKE ANYWHERE Create a lifetime of memories with your stylish, unbreakable coffee cup in hand. Enjoy while camping, perfect in your RV, take it on your next hike, keep these mugs at the office or use every day at home while dreaming up your next adventure
A JOY TO DRINK FROM - You will love drinking your coffee from these mugs thanks to the smooth rim and the comfortable handle
KEEP YOUR DRINK AT AN ENJOYABLE TEMPERATURE FOR A FEW MINUTES LONGER - Double walled insulation helps give you a little longer to enjoy your coffee, tea or favorite beverage
THE 'COLORS' MAKE IT EASY TO TELL WHICH MUG IS YOURS COME REFILL TIME - Thanks to the laser engraved color words 'black' on one cup and 'white' on the other cup

BUY IT ONCE & HAVE A LIFETIME OF VALUE – BUILT TO LAST - EASY TO CLEAN & DISHWASHER SAFE Highly polished inner wall makes cleaning easier. Brushed finish outside. Made from 100% 304 (18/8) food grade stainless steel
